body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19619 (Remove wallet.dat path handling from wallet.cpp, rpcwallet.cpp by ryanofsky)
* #19561 (refactor: Pass ArgsManager into functions that register args by S3RK)
* #19550 (rpc: Add getindexinfo RPC by fjahr)
* #19528 (rpc: Assert that RPCArg names are equal to CRPCCommand ones (misc) by MarcoFalke)
* #19471 (util: Make default arg values more specific by hebasto)
* #19463 (Prune locks by luke-jr)
* #19457 (wallet: Cleanup wallettool salvage and walletdb extraneous declarations by achow101)
* #19425 (refactor: Get rid of more redundant chain methods by ryanofsky)
* #19326 (Simplify hash.h interface using Spans by sipa)
* #19099 (refactor: Move wallet methods out of chain.h and node.h by ryanofsky)
* #19098 (test: Remove duplicate NodeContext hacks by ryanofsky)
* #19077 (wallet: Add sqlite as an alternative wallet database and use it for new descriptor wallets by achow101)
* #18980 (build: Decouple clientversion.cpp from the git repo by hebasto)
* #18904 (Don't call lsn_reset in periodic flush by bvbfan)
* #18815 (bench: Add logging benchmark by MarcoFalke)
* #18077 (net: Add NAT-PMP port forwarding support by hebasto)
* #17211 (Allow fundrawtransaction and walletcreatefundedpsbt to take external inputs by achow101)
* #16365 (Log RPC parameters (arguments) if -debug=rpcparams by LarryRuane)
* #16333 (test: Set BIP34Height = 2 for regtest by MarcoFalke)
* #15937 (Add loadwallet and createwallet load_on_startup options by ryanofsky)
* #15719 (Wallet passive startup by ryanofsky)
* #15454 (Remove the automatic creation and loading of the default wallet by achow101)
* #14053 (Add address-based index (attempt 4?) by marcinja)
* #10443 (Add fee_est tool for debugging fee estimation code by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).

Rebased 96c4cd092ed354858dfc457fafaec766b85c6e0d -> ff67a5d4c7a4899179f43fcfec4c61ef4bd7a1eb ([`pr/ipc-connect.2`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/ipc-connect.2) -> [`pr/ipc-connect.3`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/ipc-connect.3), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/ipc-connect.2-rebase..pr/ipc-connect.3)) on top of #10102 pr/ipc.118 fixing tool_wallet.py test https://travis-ci.org/github/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/705900546 https://cirrus-ci.com/build/5236734818516992 and -ipcconnect suggestion https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19461#discussion_r452402137
Rebased ff67a5d4c7a4899179f43fcfec4c61ef4bd7a1eb -> 01618ced5266687d44c4c1608ee4b0cd16246f24 ([`pr/ipc-connect.3`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/ipc-connect.3) -> [`pr/ipc-connect.4`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/ipc-connect.4), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/ipc-connect.3-rebase..pr/ipc-connect.4)) on top of #10102 pr/ipc.119
Rebased 01618ced5266687d44c4c1608ee4b0cd16246f24 -> 9848b221b9d506b00292b3e42f5eb2e63be184a1 ([`pr/ipc-connect.4`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/ipc-connect.4) -> [`pr/ipc-connect.5`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/ipc-connect.5), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/ipc-connect.4-rebase..pr/ipc-connect.5)) due to conflicts with #19561 on top of #10102 pr/ipc.123
